description.narrative: FMO has invested USD 8 mln in the equity tranche of Locfund II, which will be on-lent in local currency to Tier II/ III MFIs. Locfund II will contribute to the development of Tier II/ III MFIs by assisting them to achieve a more diversified funding base while reducing FX risks, both through the provision of scarce local currency finance and by transferring knowledge on Asset Liability Management (ALM), capital market transactions and more.
